title: Giro d’Italia Stage 14: Filippo Ganna Extracts Time Trial Revenge over Tadej Pogačar
content:
Pogačar tightens grip on pink jersey and Thomas nudges back into second place ahead of Sunday's 'queen stage': 'We need to fight with the heart and head.'

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 14: Filippo Ganna Extracts Time Trial Revenge over Tadej Pogačar on Velo.
author: sstokes
